title: Watch live streaming news here while NBC is in sports coverage
content: EVANSVILLE, Ind. (WFIE) - 14 News will be streaming top stories and weather exclusively online during their normal newscasts hours for the noon, 4 and 5 today.
This is due to sports coverage on air on NBC.
You can click here or watch the newscasts in the video player above.
You can also still see us on Roku, Amazon Fire, and Apple TV.
